greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of Q-toothpicks added at n-th stage to the structure of A187212.
comment: Essentially the first differences of A187212.
link: David Applegate, Omar E. Pol and N. J. A. Sloane, The Toothpick Sequence and Other Sequences from Cellular Automata, Congressus Numerantium, Vol. 206 (2010), 157-191. [There is a typo in Theorem 6: (13) should read u(n) = 4.3^(wt(n-1)-1) for n >= 2.]
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
formula: It appears that if n = 2^k - 1, for k >= 2, then a(n) = A139251(n) - 2 otherwise a(n) = A139251(n). - Omar E. Pol, Mar 30 2011
